dct_description_sm: Map of the Cape Peninsula including Table Bay, Hout Bay and False Bay. Surveyed in 1822, with corrections to 1861, July 1862, September 1863, and November 1864. Table Bay and the coast of the Cape Peninsula from Mouille Point to the western edge of False Bay by F. Skead.
Relief shown by spot heights and shading. Depths shown by soundings.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Compass rose shows a variation between magnetic north and true north of 29Â°40' W.
2 inset maps: Cape Hanglip -- Cape of Good Hope.
Bar scale on map given in "Nautic Miles."
dct_rights_sm: Image courtesy University of Cape Town Libraries, Special Collections: Maps scanned under the William and Yvonne Jacobson Digital Africana Program at UCT. If you have questions, please contact David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
